summary: A young man returning home to attend a wedding hooks up with a drifter who turns out to be a violent bank robber. Before he knows it, the man finds himself involved in the robber's plans.
cast: Matt Dillon|Andrew McCarthy|Leslie Hope|Alan Toy|Andy Romano|Brent Jennings|Brynn Thayer|Kyra Sedgwick|Harry Northup|Clint Allen|Arlen Dean Snyder|Jim Lovelett|Louis Giambalvo|Craig Benton|James Lea Raupp|John Lansing|Gale Mayron|T. Max Graham|Annie Kellogg|Mimi Wickliff|Linda Dawson|George Mason Kuhn|Ken Boehr|Robert Peters|Patricia Ann Grit|T. Martin Smith|Gary Cosey|Bobby Enriquez|Joseph R. Scrivo|Bart Petty|Greg Gilstrap|Art Dilks|Bret Pearson|Gail Dicus|Brent Wright|Roger Richman|Holmes Osborne|Rusty Howard|Lori Gooch|Robert Hagerman|Hank Rector|Jacquie Litto|Jeffery Feaster|Todd Stanton
title: Kansas, dos hombres, dos caminos
